answerText: Primo Levi[10] This man's recent novel The Zone of Interest is also set in Auschwitz. This man also wrote about advertisement director John Self in his novel Money: A Suicide Note.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2015 | Stanford + LASA A + MIT B | 5 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: This author titled all the stories in his collection The Periodic Table after elements. For 10 points each: [10] Name this Italian chemist and author, who wrote about the year he spent as a prisoner in Auschwitz in his memoir If This Is a Man.
